mapper.insert: insert into product (product_idx, product_name, product_price, product_desc, product_imgStr) values ((select ifnull(max(product_idx), 50000) + 1 from (select product_idx from product) as temp), #{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{product_desc}, #{product_imgStr})
mapper.select: select * from cart where member_idx = #{member_idx} and product_idx = #{product_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into cart (cart_idx, product_idx, member_idx, product_name, product_amount, product_price, product_imgStr) values ((select ifnull(max(cart_idx), 100000) + 1 from (select cart_idx from cart) as temp), #{product_idx}, #{member_idx}, #{product_name}, #{product_amount}, (#{product_amount} * #{product_price}), #{product_imgStr})
mapper.select: select * from cart order by cart_idx desc
select * from cart where member_idx = #{member_idx} order by cart_idx desc
mapper.update: update cart set product_price = #{product_price}, product_amount = #{product_amount} where cart_idx = #{cart_idx}
mapper.select: select ifnull(max(order_idx), 70000) + 1 from (select order_idx from order_tbl) as temp
mapper.insert: insert into order_tbl (order_idx, cart_idx, product_idx, member_idx, product_name, product_amount, product_price, order_price, product_imgStr) values (#{order_idx}, #{cart_idx}, #{product_idx}, #{member_idx}, #{product_name}, #{product_amount}, #{product_price}, #{order_price}, #{product_imgStr})
mapper.select: select o.order_idx, o.member_idx, m.username, sum(o.product_price) as product_price, o.order_today from order_tbl o join member m on o.member_idx = m.member_idx group by o.order_idx, o.member_idx, m.username, o.order_today order by o.order_idx desc
